data.title: BPS Parent Centers Catalog – Digital Parent Centers Catalog for Buffalo Public Schools
data.text:
Buffalo Public Schools Parent Centers promote engagement to support student and family success. Free virtual and in-person programming, and other services, are provided during the day, evening, and Community Schoolsâ Saturday Academies by BPS staff, community-based organizations and partners, local businesses, and parent organizations.Â

Parent Centers programming is organized into the following seven strands:

Academics and Instructional Technology

Social, Emotional Learning and Wellness

Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion

Parent Leadership and Advocacy

Personal and Professional Growth and Development

Soon-to-Be and New Parent Support

Family Bonding

Regularly visit this page to view current program offerings. Also, please like and follow the BPS Parent Centers and BPS Community Schools Facebook pages for important district updates and resources.
